properties.description: This pipeline is used to copy data from SQL Server on-premises data warehouse to adfcookbookcc blob storage.

source.sqlReaderQuery: $$Text.Format('SELECT   OrderDate, FirstName, LastName, CompanyName, Category, ProductName, ProvenanceCode, ProvenanceDescription, EnglishDescription, OrderQy, UnitPrice, Discount, TaxAmount, Freight, SalesOrderNumber, PurchareOrderNumber FROM AdventureWorksLTDW2014.DW.vwFactOrders WHERE OrderDate <= \'{0:yyyy-MM-dd}\'', WindowStart)
